issue_description:
# [Mobile][BUG]: UI is not properly aligned in the Add response dialogbox, Add element button is overlapped over the Rule dropdown. 

### Describe the bug

UI is not properly aligned in the Add response dialogbox, Add element button is overlapped over the Rule dropdown.


### Steps To Reproduce

1. Login to www.oppiatestserver.org
2. Go to Contributor dashboard -  Submit question
3. Click on Suggest Question for a topic
4. Select difficulty as Medium, Enter Introduction as test and click on Add interaction select Text input and click on OK
5. See Add Resposne dialogbox

### Expected Behavior

UI should be properly aligned.
Checkbox and the text can be aligned in the same line
Add element button should be aligned properly without overlapping on the dropdown

### Screenshots/Videos

![subject (15)](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/assets/101634267/4745db22-fb50-4206-b37c-b5a03c82b706)


### What device are you using?

Mobile

### Operating System

Android

### What browsers are you seeing the problem on?

Chrome

### Browser version

114.0.5735.130

### Additional context

_No response_

### Tips for developers

Before tackling the bug, please use `git bisect` (see https://git-scm.com/docs/git-bisect)
to investigate which PR caused it (you only need to go back as far as
commit https://github.com/oppia/oppia/commits/9a334e9).
If you find the PR, leave a comment on this issue pointing to it, or
just say that it happened before commit 9a334e9 if you could reproduce
it there. This will help us fix the issue by reverting the faulty PR.

Also, if this is your first issue, please make sure to follow
https://github.com/oppia/oppia/wiki/Contributing-code-to-Oppia#choosing-a-good-first-issue
and https://github.com/oppia/oppia/wiki/Contributing-code-to-Oppia#setting-things-up
before claiming it. Thanks!

issue_comments.body: ![Screenshot_20230626-172721](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/assets/101634267/46d74474-e2c2-4e5b-add0-185d0a3a068c)
![subject (17)](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/assets/101634267/d5a18c44-5ec2-4bb8-b3d0-fa5850955234)
Hi @sagangwee, thanks for proposing this as a good first issue. I am removing the label for now and looping in @DubeySandeep to approve the label. It will be added back if approved. Thanks!

For new contributors: See https://github.com/oppia/oppia/wiki/Contributor-dashboard for getting started on developing for the contributor dashboard. For this issue, we'll want to modify the CSS in core/templates/pages/exploration-editor-page/editor-tab/templates/modal-templates/add-answer-group-modal.component.html to make the response modal responsive on smaller screens. This modal is part of the question editor when submitting a question suggestion.
Thanks @sagangwee! Added to good first issues.
@KolliAnitha hii I would like to work on this issue
i want to work on issues

Hi @sivangbagri @rahulkumar161098 Please provide the proof of the chages you will be making looks good on the local server and also the files you are going to change if it looks good @sagangwee will assign you this issue.

hi @prafulbbandre @sagangwee i'd like you please assign the issue to me.

My observations:
**checkbox ;**
- Thee was an excess padding to the left of the it which causes the text label to go below it due to no space.

**Add element button:**
- It needs some top margin to not overlay on the box above..

Below are the changes i've implemented
![image](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/assets/117539036/2277570d-db02-471f-b7e5-446449136059)

please let me know if anything else needs to be changed.Any suggestion is appreciated.
please assign me this issue as well. it would be great to do that.

> please assign me this issue as well. it would be great to do that.

@testgithubsonika this issue is solved . You can look another  Good First Issue.

then why are you not closing it

Hi @testgithubsonika,
@Ykumar1415 has opened a [PR](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/pull/18634) to close this issue once that Pr gets merged this issue will automatically be closed.
@prafulbbandre Sir, I am trying to work on issue #3446, could you please guide me as to what exactly needs to be done so that I can work towards it.

i want to work on this issue please assigned me
Hi @Ykumar1415, are you still working on this issue ? If yes can you please let us know when you plan to update your PR as per reviewer's comment as it's been over a month since last review.
I want to work on this issue. Please assign me

Hi @utkarsh2110 
Thankyou for showing interest in this issue.
As Per the guidance at [Contributing-code-to-Oppia](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/wiki/Contributing-code-to-Oppia), please provide an explanation of what your PR will do (with names of files you're changing, what you plan to change in each file, etc.). If it looks good, we can assign you to this issue.
